Instead of continue the P.E. class during the covid peak. It would be better for PE class to be online. I also kinda not get the idea of wearing mask during exercise. It quite difficult for me.
老詩人很好，還會親自下來教學給予關心!
老師人真的很好，我真的好討厭腳下運動，但因為喜歡老師，也相信老師的教學，所以去上課不會那麼痛苦。
